titles.title: As gathered in Thy precious name

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}As gathered in Thy precious name, This table we surround, Thy death, Lord Jesus, to proclaim, O may our praise abound.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We give what from Thee we receive, For all we have is Thine— O may each heart with joy believe, And echo “Thine is mine!”{/lang-eng}
